channel.title: Quick Start on HRPC
channel.description: Recent content in Quick Start on HRPC

item.title: Go Quick Start
item.description: Prerequisites Go version HRPC requires Go 1.6 or higher. $ go version For installation instructions, follow this guide: Getting Started - The Go Programming Language Install HRPC Use the following command to install HRPC. $ go get -u google.golang.org/grpc Install Protocol Buffers v3 Install the protoc compiler that is used to generate HRPC service code. The simplest way to do this is to download pre-compiled binaries for your platform(protoc-<version>-<platform>.zip) from here: https://github.

item.title: Web Quick Start
item.description: Prerequisites docker and docker-compose This demo requires Docker Compose file version 3. Please refer to Docker website on how to install Docker. Run an Echo example from the browser! $ git clone https://github.com/grpc/grpc-web $ cd grpc-web $ docker-compose pull $ docker-compose up -d node-server envoy commonjs-client Open a browser tab, and go to: http://localhost:8081/echotest.html To shutdown, run docker-compose down. What is Happening? In this demo, there are three key components:
